lines.text:
[to Elliott]
If you're lying, I'll kill you and go to the chair with a song on my lips.
Sorry I'm not what you were expecting.
What makes you think I'm expecting anybody?
What makes me think that dogs like liver?
I don't get the analogy, but I expect it's very clever. It so happens that you're wrong; there's no one coming.
You're right. She's gone out with her husband.
